project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a CSV file and performs basic data analysis by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Set up the project environment and dependencies
Implement functionality to read the CSV file
Implement functionality to compute the mean for specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to compute the median for specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to compute the mode for specified numerical columns
Implement user input handling for selecting columns for analysis
Write tests for each of the implemented features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
